import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { VacancyDetailsService } from './vacancy-details.service'; import { ICompany, IVacancy } from '../interfaces/vacancy'; import * as L from 'leaflet'; @Component({ selector: 'app-vacancy-details', templateUrl: './vacancy-details.component.html', styleUrls: ['./vacancy-details.component.scss'], }) export class VacancyDetailsComponent implements OnInit { vacancy?: IVacancy; company?: ICompany; sameVacancy?: IVacancy[]; isHovered = false; // map?: L.Map; constructor( private activatedRoute: ActivatedRoute, private detailsService: VacancyDetailsService ) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.activatedRoute.params.subscribe((params) => { const id = +params['id']; this.getVacancyAndCompany(id); }); // this.getMap(); } // getMap() { // this.map = L.map('map').setView([0, 0], 13); // L.tileLayer('https://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png').addTo( // this.map // ); // console.log(this.map); // } getVacancyAndCompany(id: number) { // const id = this.activatedRoute.snapshot.paramMap.get('id'); if (id) { this.detailsService.getVacancy(Number(id)).subscribe({ next: (vac) => { this.vacancy = vac; console.log(this.vacancy.description); this.detailsService.getCompany(vac.companyId).subscribe({ next: (data) => { this.company = data; }, }); this.detailsService.getSameVacancy(Number(id)).subscribe({ next: (data) => { this.sameVacancy = data; console.log(this.sameVacancy); }, }); }, }); } } splitIntoSentences(text: string): string[] { return text.split(/(?<=[.;])\s+/); } }
